segments.text: a close-up of the room's door lock.

critique:
1. At the end, the camera doesn't move to the right but pans right

2. The final shot is not a close-up of the lock but a close-up of the room's door

captions.single: The background features a blurry silhouette of a person. After waving goodbye, the figure turns and leaves to the left, lightly pushing the door with their left hand. A hand lightly sways in front of the camera, and the man reaches forward to close the door before leaving. The camera then moves to the right, ending with a close-up of the room's door lock.
